import React, { useState, useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import { AuthenticatedUser } from "../contexts/AuthenticatedUser.js" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const Music = () => { const [musicList, setMusicList] = useState({ music: [] }) const { authUser, setAuthUser } = useContext(AuthenticatedUser) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/music/') .then(res => { setMusicList({ music: res.data }) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }, []) return (
{authUser.username != '' ?
{musicList.music.map(({ file }, key) => ( {file} )) }
# Title Author
1 Mark Otto @mdo 2 Jacob Thornton @fat 3 Larry the Bird @twitter
:
You are not logged in!

In order to browse and listen to music you need to either login to your account or create a new one.

}
) } export default Music;
